tool_description: Applies audio processing effects including noise reduction, equalization, compression, and enhancement to improve speech audio quality and characteristics.

input_audio.description: Base64 encoded audio data to process

equalization_preset.description: EQ preset: speech, broadcast, podcast, or natural

error_messages: Invalid audio data: Input audio format is not supported or corrupted.
Invalid equalization preset: Use speech, broadcast, podcast, or natural.
Processing failed: Audio processing encountered an error.
Audio too short: Input audio must be at least 0.1 seconds long.
usage: Provide input_audio as base64 encoded data. Optionally enable noise_reduction, dynamic_range_compression, volume_normalization and set equalization_preset. Returns processed audio with enhancement metadata.
